# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the pasteboard.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: UIPasteboard.Name { get }
```

## Discussion

Names of app pasteboard objects should be unique across installed apps. If the object is a system pasteboard, this property returns one of the constants described in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/pasteboard-names].

## Related Documentation

- **init(name:create:)**: Returns a pasteboard that you identify by name, optionally creating it if it doesn’t exist.
- **withUniqueName()**: Returns an app pasteboard that you identify by a unique system-generated name.

## Getting and setting pasteboard attributes

- **changeCount**: The number of times the pasteboard’s contents change.
